data.title: Hey! I'm Talkin' Here: The Story Behind the Hit Comedy Documentary I'M NO DUMMY
data.meta_description: HEY I'M TALKIN' HERE tells the fascinating story behind the making of the comedy documentary, I'm No Dummy, which stars Jeff Dunham, Jay Johnson, and Lynn Trefgzer, and is the first feature film examining the art of ventriloquism. Making movies is extremely difficult, if not nearly impossible. While pulling back the curtain on how this particular film was made, the book also provides many illuminating insights about filmmaking in general. Includes a Full Transcription of the Film. With Foreword by Jay Johnson.All proceeds go to Vent Haven, the only museum in the world dedicated to art of ventriloquism.
data.text:
Description

HEY I'M TALKIN' HERE tells the fascinating story behind the making of the comedy documentary, I'm No Dummy, which stars Jeff Dunham, Jay Johnson, and Lynn Trefgzer, and is the first feature film examining the art of ventriloquism. Making movies is extremely difficult, if not nearly impossible. While pulling back the curtain on how this particular film was made, the book also provides many illuminating insights about filmmaking in general.
